naslov: Prodaja - Kuća 180 m2 s garažom i spremištem - Markuševec (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaja - Kuća 180 m2 s garažom i spremištem m2 -  Markuševec Prodajemo samostojeću kuću koja se nalazi na Markuševcu, na Markuševečkoj cesti. Kuća se sastoji od prizemlja, kata i potkrovlja. Prizemlje i kat imaju po 70 m2, a potkrovlje ima 40 m2. Kući pripada dvorište površine 444 m2 u kojem se nalaze spremište (20 m2) i garaža (20 m2). U prizemlju se nalaze: hodnik, dvije sobe, kuhinja, kupaonica te spremište. Iz prizemlja se izlazi na terasu koja je povezana s vrtom. Unutarnjim stubišem dolazi se na prvi kat. Na katu su: hodnik, dvije sobe, kuhinja, kupaonica te toalet i balkon. Iznad kata nalazi se neuređen tavan. Kuća je kvalitetne betonske gradnje, izgrađena 1964. godine. Nije bilo oštećenja od potresa, no kuća je za kompletnu adaptaciju. Grijanje je centralno etažno plinsko. Sobe gledaju na istočnu stranu, odnosno na Markuševečku cestu, a kuhinja na dvorište, odnosno na mirnu, zapadnu stranu. S obzirom da se kuća nalazi na uglu, postoji mogućnost pristupa s dvije strane. Blizina autobusne stanice, crkve, trgovine, parka-šume Remete. For Sale - House 180 m² with Garage and Storage - Markuševec We are selling a detached house located in Markuševec, on Markuševečka Road. The house consists of a ground floor, first floor, and an attic. The ground floor and the first floor each have 70 m², while the attic has 40 m². The house comes with a yard of 444 m², which includes a storage unit (20 m²) and a garage (20 m²). On the ground floor, there is: a hallway, two rooms, a kitchen, a bathroom, and a storage room. The ground floor leads to a terrace connected to the garden. An internal staircase leads to the first floor. The first floor has: a hallway, two rooms, a kitchen, a bathroom, a toilet, and a balcony. Above the first floor is an unfinished attic. The house is of solid concrete construction, built in 1964. There was no earthquake damage, but the house requires complete renovation. Heating is provided by a central gas system. The rooms face east, towards Markuševečka Road, while the kitchen faces the yard, which is on the quiet, western side. Since the house is on a corner lot, there is access from two sides. Close to a bus stop, church, store, and the Remete park-fores. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Petrinjska 22, Zagreb Federica Grisogona 8, Zadar
